name: Idorecall.GitHub.io
body:
# Welcome to iDoRecall

[iDoRecall](https://iDoRecall.com) is a cross-platform app that helps users memorize anything they want to learn, by seamlessly prompting them to recall information at the right time. We use proven research and methodologies, such as spaced repetition, or [the testing effect](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Testing_effect).

## Open source contributions

iDoRecall believes in the values of open source and is proud to contribute the following:

* [selection-menu](http://idorecall.github.io/selection-menu/) - JavaScript context menu on selection
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
